content.theme: Unseen. Unheard. Lethal. The best fight is the one they never saw coming.
content.design: Shadow augments reward stealth, ambushes, and hit-and-run tactics.

augments.name: Threat Awareness
augments.effect: Cannot be surprised. Always act in round 1

augments.name: Quick Escape Wiring
augments.effect: 1/combat: disengage from melee without opportunity attack

augments.name: Ambush Protocol
augments.effect: +2 accuracy on first attack if hidden/undetected

augments.name: Exploit Weakness
augments.effect: +1 damage die vs enemies who haven't acted yet

augments.name: Vanishing Act
augments.effect: 1/combat: become hidden even in plain sight for 1 round

augments.name: Backstab Wiring
augments.effect: Attacks vs unaware/flanked targets: +2 acc and +1 damage die

augments.name: Shadow Step
augments.effect: 1/combat: teleport to any shadow/cover within medium range

augments.name: Misdirection Field
augments.effect: 1/round: redirect one attack to adjacent enemy instead

augments.name: Phase Cloak
augments.effect: 1/mission: intangible for 1 round. Cannot be hit or hit others

augments.name: Death's Hand
augments.effect: Undetected kill â†’ immediately hide again

augments.name: Phantom
augments.effect: While hidden: attacks auto-crit. After attacking, may spend 2 AP to re-hide
